string.text: I'm hurt damn it, don't you see that? I need a medkit or at least a bandage.
Thanks bro', I won't forget it.
So how do you go around the Zone then? What if you're infected or something? You won't even be able to heal yourself!
Sorry man. But if I give you mine I won't have any left for myself.
It's your business, but it doesn't do you any good.
How long would you like to sleep?
You don't want to sleep now.
Your reputation is terrible. You are unable to sleep.
To sleep here, you must turn off the transmitter.
To sleep, treat your radiation poisoning.
